com.stormpath.sdk.client
Class Clients

java.lang.Object
  com.stormpath.sdk.client.Clients

public final class Clients
extends Object

Static utility/helper class for working with Client resources. For example: 

 Clients.builder()
     .setFileLocation(path)
     .setProxy(new Proxy("192.168.2.120", 9001))
     .build();

Since:
1.0.alpha
